welcome_body: Describe your idea, start a run, then inspect the Trace and export a report.
run_help: The app plans tasks, executes, and synthesizes a report.
no_trace_body: Start a run to see step by step output.
reports_empty_body: Run the pipeline or check a different run.
metrics_empty_body: Metrics appear after you complete a few runs.
settings_help: Defaults apply to new runs. Changes do not affect running sessions.
include_adv_help: Include advanced configuration in the share link.
share_link_help: Copies a link encoding the current configuration.
start_run_help: Plan, execute tasks, and synthesize a report.
reports_caption: Preview and export artifacts for this run.
bundle_download_help: Download a zip bundle of artifacts.
metrics_date_help: Filter metrics by start and end date.
budget_limit_help: Budget limit in USD for new runs.
knowledge_sources_help: Data sources available to the run.
show_trace_help: Show trace page after run completion.
auto_export_help: Automatically export artifacts when a run finishes.
trace_page_size_help: Number of rows shown per trace page.
share_adv_label: Include advanced options in share links
share_adv_help: Include advanced options when sharing links.
import_prefs_help: Upload a JSON file to overwrite preferences.
